00036 typedef enum mamaSubscMsgType
00037 {
00038     MAMA_SUBSC_SUBSCRIBE            = 0,
00039     MAMA_SUBSC_SNAPSHOT             = 1,
00040     MAMA_SUBSC_UNSUBSCRIBE          = 2,
00041     MAMA_SUBSC_RESUBSCRIBE          = 3,
00042     MAMA_SUBSC_REFRESH              = 4,
00043     MAMA_SUBSC_DDICT_SNAPSHOT       = 5,
00044     MAMA_SUBSC_WORLDVIEW_RQST       = 6,
00045     MAMA_SUBSC_DQ_SUBSCRIBER        = 7,  
00046     MAMA_SUBSC_DQ_PUBLISHER         = 8,  
00047     MAMA_SUBSC_DQ_NETWORK           = 9,  
00048     MAMA_SUBSC_DQ_UNKNOWN           = 10, 
00049     MAMA_SUBSC_FEATURE_SET_RQST     = 11,
00050     MAMA_SUBSC_DQ_GROUP_SUBSCRIBER  = 12  
00051 } mamaSubscMsgType;
